    • Method Detail

      • correctTopicOfComment

        public void correctTopicOfComment(Long noteId)
        Description copied from interface: NoteManagement
        Corrects the topic of a comment note if it does not equal the topic of the discussion root note. This method helps to resolve inconsistent discussions if move and edit or comment operations ran concurrently.
        Parameters:
        noteId - ID of the comment note that was created or updated

      • getAutosave

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public AutosaveNoteData getAutosave(Long noteId,
                                                                   Long parentNoteId,
                                                                   Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties,
                                                                   Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: NoteManagement
        Return an autosave of the current user. The parameters noteId and parentNoteId can be used to retrieve an autosave for an edit operation or a comment.
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of a note to get the autosave of the edit operation of this note. Can be null.
        parentNoteId - the ID of a parent note to get the autosave of a comment to this note. Can be null.
        properties - properties which should be used to get filters for finding an autosave. The filters are resolved with the help of the registered AutosavePropertyFilterProvider the re Can be null.
        locale - the locale to use when filling localizable content of the note like tags
        Returns:
        the autosave or null if there is none

      • getNote

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public NoteData getNote(long noteId,
                                                       NoteRenderContext renderContext)
                                                throws NoteNotFoundException,
                                                       AuthorizationException
        Parameters:
        noteId - The note id.
        renderContext - The rendering context. If the render mode of the context is null, no NoteRenderingPreProcessors will be called.
        Returns:
        The note as NoteData.
        Throws:
        NoteNotFoundException - Thrown, when there is no note for this id.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access the note.

      • getNote

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public <T> T getNote(Long noteId,
                                                    Converter<Note,T> converter)
        Method to get a specific note.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the return value.
        Parameters:
        noteId - The notes id.
        converter - The converter to convert the note.
        Returns:
        The note in the desired converter output or null, if none.

      • moveToTopic

        public void moveToTopic(Long discussionId,
                        Long topicId)
                 throws NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        Method to move a given discussion to another topic.
        Parameters:
        discussionId - Id of the discussion to move.
        topicId - If of the new topic.
        Throws:
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - Thrown, when the use isn't allowed to write within the given topic.

      • noteExists

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public boolean noteExists(Long noteId)
        Description copied from interface: NoteManagement
        Checks whether a note exists. It is not checked whether the current user has read access to the note.
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note to retrieve
        Returns:
        true if the note exists, false otherwise

      • updateFollowableItems

        public void updateFollowableItems(Long noteId,
                                  boolean updateChildren)
        Update the followable items of a given note and optionally although of its children.
        Parameters:
        noteId - Id of the note to update.
        updateChildren - If true, all children will be updated too.

                                             Timestamp creationDate)
        Method to update the last discussion creation date.
        Parameters:
        noteId - Id of the note, which is part of the discussion.
        creationDate - The new date to set.
